name: Super Dungeon Bros
description: Super Dungeon Bros is a rock-themed dungeon brawler where a band of mighty rock bros must navigate the fantasy realm of RÃ¶kheim and its hellish dungeons to seek out epic loot, fight hordes of evil undead and uncover the legends of long lost fabled Rock Stars!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 740 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2500 MB available space
